value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. This focuses on Power BI Desktop and the main storage modes - Import, DirectQuery and Live Connections to Analysis Services. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)

value.title: Power Query! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI
value.excerpt: Not a coder? Don't understand Power Query M syntax? Power Query can be fun, but also can turn complicated. Learning Power Query can make Power BI and Excel very rewarding. Adam has some resources to get you started in your journey.  Concept: Roche's Maxim https://ssbipolar.com/2021/05/31/roches-maxim/

value.excerpt: Patrick walks you through how to use custom format strings in Power BI Desktop. From dates and time to numbers, he calls out some things to look out for. value.title: Why and how to use data protection in Power BI
value.excerpt: Data protection in Power BI can help you to prevent data leakage and have confidence in your data approach. Data Protection documentation overview https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-security-data-protection-overview

value.title: Why isn't my Agg hitting when using DISTINCTCOUNT in Power BI???
value.excerpt: Using Aggregations in Power BI? Have some DISTINCTCOUNT in your measures? Wondering why the queries are slow and not hitting the aggs? Patrick shows you what is going on! Get ready for some DAX fusion!  DAX Fusion: https://dax.tips/2019/08/05/dax-fusion/  Aggregations Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/aggregations-advanced

value.title: Working with images in Power BI

This looks at how you can integrate visuals in your visuals based on your data.  LET'S CONNECT!
